original_text: But the Lord sent a great fish to swallow Jonah. Jonah was inside the fish's stomach for three days and three nights.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이미 큰 물고기를 예비하사 요나를 삼키게 하셨으므로 요나가 밤낮 삼 일을 물고기 뱃속에 있으니라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord sent a great fish
Jonah was inside the fish's stomach
for three days and three nights
